ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One of the problems in Kelethin is that as far as I can tell, nearly every merchant there views wood elves apprehensively. /bug it every chance you get.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 May 1999, Proteus wrote:
>
> Hmm, interesting. As a human with a charisma of 90 I can buy a steel
> breastplate in freeport for 700-something plat. I havent checked the prices
> recently though, they may have changed it since for some reason. I'll check up
> on this and see.
> May I ask where you purchased it and what race you are?
>
> > I recently purchased a steel breastplate. It was 980 or so platinum at 90
> > charisma. Putting on my two +5 charisma items reduced the price by around
> > 40 plat. I then got a friendly shaman to cast a charisma buff on me,
> > bringing my total up to 115; this brought the price down to less than 900
> > platinum. Sorry, I don't remember the exact figures.
> >
> > - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro

One of the problems in Kelethin is that as far as I can tell,
nearly every merchant there views wood elves apprehensively.
/bug it every chance you get. Maybe that's what's going on?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
